allData.occupation: Professor Theater Management/ Theater Researcher at University of Music and Performing Arts Frankfurt/Main

positions.title: Professor Theater Management/ Theater Researcher
positions.description:
Professor of Theater and Music Management, Director of Master Program Theater and Orchestra Management, Board Member of the Hessian Theater Academy,
Courses: Cultural Critique 1+2, Drama and Dramaturgy, Theater Management 1-3, Cultural Politics, Development of Compentency in Communication, Negotiation, Writing, Mentoring,
positions.companyName: University of Music and Performing Arts Frankfurt/Main

positions.title: Guest Professor
positions.description:
Lecture: "Management in the context of Leadership and Governance in the Performing Arts"
in the Postgraduate Programm "Cultural Management and Sustainability"
Students are: theater directors and executives, artists, representatives and executives of the cultural policy

positions.title: Guest Professor
positions.description: Courses and projects: The Art of Drama with Undergraduate Students of Harvard College as well as coordination and direction of a student production: William Shakespeare's King Lear.
positions.locationName: Cambridge, Massachusetts, Vereinigte Staaten von Amerika

positions.title: Guest Professor
positions.description: Guest Lectures at the A.R.T./Harvard University Program of Dramaturgy.
positions.locationName: Cambridge, Massachusetts, Vereinigte Staaten von Amerika

positions.title: CEO and Artistic Director
positions.description: In parallel to my work as Professor in Frankfurt, I took over the duties of CEO and general artistic director of the National Theater and the State Orchestra Weimar (Staatskapelle Weimar). My tasks included the development of the artistic program, the program titles, the search of artists, contract negotiations, contacts with politicians, stakeholders and audience, personnel management, and much more.

skills: Programm design, Curation (International Talks on Globalization 1999-2003)

volunteerExperiences.description: Beratung der Präsidentin in kulturpolitischen und Fragen der Struktur der Theaterlandschaft, der Funktionsweise, Krisen und strukturellen Probleme der Theaterbetriebe und der Möglichkeiten, diese zu reformieren. Entwickeln von Reformoptionen. Unterstützen von Mitarbeiter*innen und Ensembles von Theatern in Krise (Trier, Karlsruhe, Cottbus, Darmstadt, Ingolstadt, Köln, Staatsoper Berlin, Volksbühne Berlin u.v.a.m.). Teilnahme als Speaker an verschiedenen Bundes-Ensemble-Versammlungen. Redaktionelle Arbeit, Texten.
Ich nehme regelmäßig an den Treffen und Vorträgen teil und habe selbst bereits Vorträge gehalten, zuletzt über "The structural dilemmata of the cultural organizations" am 5.12.2023.
volunteerExperiences.companyName: alma - Alliance of Leaders in Music and Arts

allData.headline: Professor Theater Management/ Theater Researcher at University of Music and Performing Arts Frankfurt/Main
allData.summary:
Theater, music, literature, film, photography, the visual arts, and the humanities are my life. I was very fortunate to have grown up in a family that valued the arts - that has always shaped my life. I'm glad that I can network with such outstanding artists and scientists of all genres worldwide here on LinkedIn - it's a great privilege.
My particular passion is theater. After working as a dramaturge and dramatist, as a producer and theater director, I dedicate my life to teach and train young, talented people for careers in management, organization and planning, in dramaturgy and program planning for theaters, orchestras and festivals and independent companies. I have been teaching for over 20 years, first parallel to my work as a theater director, later as a professor. Many of our alumni are already working very successfully in the theater and music world and shaping the future of the cultural landscapes. 
My second focus is on researching the current development of the German and European, but also the American theater landscapes, from Canada to Chile. The focus is now on examining the German-speaking theater landscape in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. I am interested in uncovering crises (2016), injustice, inequality, discrimination and abuse of power (2019, 2023), dealing with the problems in cultural policy (2021/22) and the programmatic development of models for the "Theater of the Future" (2024). In recent years I have been working on a new research project called the "Ethical Theater", in which I researched the development of the theater landscape over the last 20 years and contrasted it with the future model of the Ethical Theater. The publication on this project, ETHISCHES THEATER, will appear at the end of April 2024 in German language, a translation into English is planned.
